Coffee grinder as a spice grinder: A coffee grinder can be used to grind up various spices, such as cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger. This can be a convenient and cost-effective way to grind spices at home.
Coffee grinder as a nut butter maker: With a little bit of experimentation, you can use a coffee grinder to make your own nut butter, such as almond butter or peanut butter.

Coffee grinder as a flour maker: With a little bit of experimentation, you can use a coffee grinder to make your own flour from grains such as wheat, rice, or corn.
